mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visitor(owner_id, visitor_name, visit_time, plate_number, status) VALUES(#{ownerId}, #{visitorName}, #{visitTime}, #{plateNumber}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE visitor SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT v.*, o.name as ownerName FROM visitor v LEFT JOIN owner o ON v.owner_id = o.id WHERE v.id = #{id}
